metadata.Title: CVE-2015-1200 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Race condition in pxz 4.999.99 Beta 3 uses weak file permissions for the output file when compressing a file before changing the permission to match the original file, which allows local users to bypass the intended access restrictions.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-1200` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

pxz - 4.999.99~beta3+git659fc9b-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: pxz package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.999.99~beta3+git659fc9b-3').
